message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR 

The paper proposes a method for cross-domain learning using sparse coding. The method is evaluated on image classification and spam detection tasks, which are typically addressed in the computer vision and machine learning subfields. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of Maximum Mean Discrepancy (MMD) criterion, which is commonly used in multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR) research.
